short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to proxy a e-resource through the Chalmers Library Proxy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you locate an e-resource via a search engine or receive a full-text link some other way, you will not be recognized as a Chalmers user. Use this extension to proxy the e-resource.
